metadata.description: For the first time ever, Gold Digger: The Hitchhiker's Guide to Lost Cities is presented in magnificent full-color! Until now, this original four-issue mini-series was almost impossible to find. Now A.P. re-offers these timeless tales, adding a whole new dimension. Finally, experience classic GD as it was meant to be seen!
metadata.name: Gold Digger Color Remix, Vol. 1
